Package com.informatica.mdm.spi.externalcall

This package contains classes that can be used to implement custom logic in external calls.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomLogic
    Encapsulates Custom Logic.
    CustomLogicFactory
    Factory for creating instances of custom logic for particular phase of BE service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExternalCallProcessor
    This class is a "request router".
    ExternalCallRequest
    External Web Service should accept this type as request (message part for soap operation input)
    ExternalCallResponse
    External Web Service should return this type as request (message part for soap operation output)
    ExternalCallUtils  
    Header
    Information about ORS, user, his roles, etc
    ObjectFactory
    This object contains factory methods for each Java content interface and Java element interface generated in the com.informatica.mdm.spi.externalcall package.
    Parameter
    Java class for Parameter complex type.
    Password
    Java class for Password complex type.
    ServiceCall
    This class contains actual Business Entity data and parameters that we passed to service.
    ServiceError
    Java class for ServiceError complex type.
    Trigger
    Explains context for external web service call: Business Entity that is being processed by Hub, processing phase.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ServicePhase
    Java class for ServicePhase.

Package com.informatica.mdm.spi.externalcall Description

This package contains classes that can be used to implement custom logic in external calls. See "BESExternalCall" project in resource kit as an example. The assumption is that external webservice is created via javax.xml.ws API.

The main components are:

  • CustomLogic - encapsulates piece of custom logic. instance of this class will be called for one service phase.
  • CustomLogicFactory - this is factory class that build instances of CustomLogic for each request based on Business Entity type, service phase, etc
  • ExternalCallProcessor - is a request router. It parses WS request from Hub/BES, calls custom logic factory to get related implementation of a custom logic, invokes it and then prepares response that will be sent back to Hub/BES
